text: Sphingomonas ginsenosidimutans is a Gram-negative, strictly aerobic, non- spore-forming and non-motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from soil from a ginseng field in Pocheon in Korea.UniProt == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas ginsenosidimutans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase ginsenosidimutans Category:Bacteria described in 2011
title: Sphingomonas ginsenosidimutans
